Permit review time estimator

Use this planning tool to set realistic expectations for first review, correction cycles, and total timeline. Ranges are planning assumptions, not agency guarantees.

Last updated: 2026-02-18

Review timing ranges

Project type
Submittal quality
Corrections expected
StageEstimated daysNotes
First review12-20Typical queue + assignment
Each correction round7-14Depends on scope clarity
Post-approval issuance2-5Final checks and fees
Total planning range28-53Update when comments arrive

Use with your live workflow

Pair this with live permit feed checks to spot bottlenecks by trade and neighborhood.
